TopicTitle: Suggestion: Add Navball markers to the smiley list.

Articles.Content:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130301-Tutorial-Docking-Problem?p=2112966&viewfull=1#post2112966](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130301-Tutorial-Docking-Problem?p=2112966&viewfull=1#post2112966)

You may want to adjust the color of the yellow ones though.
I support this idea.
Yup. I approve of this.

Total support!
